results.description: Combine price momentum with specific risk to favor high momentum, low idiosyncratic risk names. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two fields (momentum and specific risk). SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector fields available). Coverage for both >0.6 so SUGGESTION3 not needed. Both fields have moderate-to-high userCount so SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence set to 0.78 because momentum is robust cross-sectionally and specific risk reduces noise.

Go against very high short-interest when short-interest correlates with recent specific underperformance. Used short_interest_factor_score and daily_specific_return (SUGGESTION1). No vectors so SUGGESTION2 skipped. Coverage 1.0 so ts_backfill not needed (SUGGESTION3). High userCount for short interest supports signal (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.65 — signal can be noisy and crowd dynamics matter.

Prefer securities with falling hedge-fund ownership percent but positive recent specific returns (potential unwinds). Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and daily_specific_return (SUGGESTION1). No vector ops. Coverage=1 so no ts_backfill. High userCount supports use (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.70 because HF flows are predictive but can be persistent.

results.idea: Low specific risk value growth tilt
results.description: Favor names with low specific risk variance and high growth factor loading to capture stable growth winners. Used specific_risk_variance and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_growth (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. Coverage >0.9; no backfill. Used high userCount growth factor (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.72 given risk-adjustment of growth reduces drawdowns.

Favor high value score but penalize tiny market caps by dividing value by log market cap. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and current_market_cap_usd (SUGGESTION1). No vectors. Coverage high; no backfill. Both fields have strong userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.68 — size-adjusted value often improves robustness.

Boost momentum signals when sentiment is positive: multiply momentum by sentiment zscore. Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt (SUGGESTION1). No vector ops. Coverage=1 so no backfill. Both factors have high userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.74 because sentiment can amplify momentum.

results.idea: Low hedge fund ownership with earnings quality
results.description: Favor low hedge fund ownership percent combined with high earnings quality to find undervalued, stable names. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty (SUGGESTION1). No vector ops and coverage high. Hedge fund field has very high userCount supporting signal (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.66 — moderate because ownership dynamics can lag fundamentals.

Long names with strong profit loading and low leverage exposure. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_leverage (SUGGESTION1). No vectors; coverage high for both. Both have strong userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.71 — profitability and conservative balance sheets are predictive.

Exploit short-term reversal where high short-term reversal loading and low residual volatility indicate mean-reversion candidates. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_strevrsl and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol (SUGGESTION1). Vector ops not applicable. Coverage high enough; no backfill. Confidence 0.63: reversal signals are weaker with high vol.

Short stocks that combine high short interest and negative momentum. Uses short_interest_factor_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum (SUGGESTION1). No vector. Coverage high. Short interest has good userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.60 due to potential squeeze risk.

Prefer stocks with high earnings yield and positive momentum: multiply earnings-yield loading by momentum zscore. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum (SUGGESTION1). No vectors, coverage high. Both with sizable userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.73 — value+momentum is robust.

Favor small short-interest but adjusted for size: subtract short-interest zscore divided by log market cap. Uses short_interest_factor_score and current_market_cap_usd (SUGGESTION1). No vectors and coverage high. Confidence 0.62 because size adjustments reduce microstructure noise.

results.idea: High momentum, low specific risk variance
results.description: Combine momentum with inverse specific risk variance to favor momentum with stable idiosyncratic profile. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and specific_risk_variance (SUGGESTION1). No vector usage. Coverage high; specific_risk_variance has moderate userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.75 given risk control helps momentum.

Short names with high hedge fund ownership percent but poor profit loading. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit (SUGGESTION1). No vector ops. Hedge fund field high userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.59 since crowding unwinds can be abrupt.

Favor high earnings quality and penalize high residual volatility. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol (SUGGESTION1). No vectors. Coverage of earnqlty ~0.95 but still >0.6, so no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.69 given earnings quality stability.

Capture momentum among midcap names by multiplying midcap loading with momentum. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_midcap and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum (SUGGESTION1). No vector ops. Coverage high and both have decent userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.64 because midcap momentum has liquidity considerations.

Boost earnings-yield names when sentiment is strong: multiply earnyild by sentmt. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt (SUGGESTION1). No vector ops. Coverage high and sentiment has high userCount (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.70 — sentiment amplifies fundamental signals.

Favor high prospect loading and positive daily specific return to catch re-rating. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect and daily_specific_return (SUGGESTION1). No vectors; coverage high. Prospect fields have good userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.67 as analyst-driven changes can persist.

results.idea: Low specific risk uncertainty with profit
results.description: Combine low estimation uncertainty with high profit loading to find reliable profitable firms. Uses specific_risk_uncertainty and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit (SUGGESTION1). Short names with extreme residual volatility paired with negative recent specific returns. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol and daily_specific_return (SUGGESTION1). No vectors. Coverage=1; no backfill. Confidence 0.58 — high vol names can behave unpredictably.

Long value-heavy names that currently have low momentum (mean-revert to value). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum (SUGGESTION1). No vectors and coverage high. Confidence 0.61 — value+reversion is cyclical.

results.idea: Short-term reversal scaled by short interest
results.description: Increase short positions where short-term reversal loading is negative and short interest is high. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_strevrsl and short_interest_factor_score (SUGGESTION1). No vector ops. Coverage high. Confidence 0.60 due to squeeze risk.

Favor stocks with strong industry momentum relative to market by subtracting market loading from industry-specific momentum (uses semiconductors_exposure_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market). results.idea: High earnings quality, low specific risk variance
results.description: Combine high earnings quality with low idiosyncratic variance. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty and specific_risk_variance (SUGGESTION1). No vec ops. Coverage >0.9 so no backfill. Confidence 0.72 — robust fundamental risk-adjusted pick.

results.idea: Momentum / size to favor small momentum
results.description: Amplify momentum for smaller market caps: divide momentum by log market cap. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and current_market_cap_usd (SUGGESTION1). No vectors. Coverage high. Confidence 0.63 — liquidity risk for tiny caps acknowledged.
